hedline.hl1: ADC AND BROADBAND IN $2.25 BILLION DEAL

abstract.p: ADC Telecommunications acquires Broadband Access Systems, maker of software and hardware for high-speed Internet access, for stock valued at $2.25 billion (S)

block.p: ADC Telecommunications, a telephone equipment maker, said yesterday that it had agreed to buy the privately held Broadband Access Systems, a maker of software and hardware for high-speed Internet access, for stock valued at $2.25 billion. ADC will issue $2.25 billion worth of its common stock to pay for all outstanding equity in Broadband Access. ADC's shares fell $2.44, to $32.44.
